queries.query:
from(bucket: "health")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "health_metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "device_count")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "max")

colors.name: Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?
Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?
Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?

queries.query:
top10IPs = from(bucket: "netscan")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ping")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rtt_ms")
  |> group(columns: ["ip"]) 
  |> mean()
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 10)
  |> findColumn(fn: (key) => true, column: "ip") 

// --- Step 2: Get the time-series data for *only* those 10 IPs ---
from(bucket: "netscan")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ping")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rtt_ms")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.ip, set: top10IPs))
  |> group(columns: ["ip"]) 
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false) 
  |> yield(name: "mean")

top10IPs = from(bucket: "netscan")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ping")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rtt_ms")
  |> group(columns: ["ip"]) 
  |> mean()
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: false)
  |> limit(n: 10)
  |> findColumn(fn: (key) => true, column: "ip") 

// --- Step 2: Get the time-series data for *only* those 10 IPs ---
from(bucket: "netscan")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ping")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rtt_ms")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.ip, set: top10IPs))
  |> group(columns: ["ip"]) 
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false) 
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "netscan")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ping")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "success")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == true)
  |> group() // This is the fix: merges all data into one table
  |> distinct(column: "ip") // Now finds all unique IPs from the single table
  |> count() // Counts the total number of unique IPs

from(bucket: "health")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "health_metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "suspended_devices")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")
